Frost.help: This power emanates a very short cone of Frost from the Hero's hands chilling all those in its arc. This attacks slowly chills the target over time, slowly dealing damage and slowing his attack speed.
Frost.targetHelp: This power emanates a very short cone of Frost from the Hero's hands chilling all those in its arc. This attacks slowly chills the target over time, slowly dealing damage and slowing his attack speed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Frozen_Fists.help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice giving them the ability to quickly inflict minor damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Frozen_Fists.targetHelp: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice giving them the ability to quickly inflict minor damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Ice_Bolt.help: You have been slowed by the freezing Ice Bolt. Your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.
Ice_Bolt.targetHelp: You have been slowed by the freezing Ice Bolt. Your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

Freeze_Ray.help: The Freeze Ray has rendered you unconscious. Any damage will awaken you.
Freeze_Ray.targetHelp: The Freeze Ray has rendered you unconscious. Any damage will awaken you.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Ice_Storm.help: The Ice Storm is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds are reduced.
Ice_Storm.targetHelp: The Ice Storm is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

Blizzard.help: The Blizzard is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your Accuracy, attack speed and movement speed are reduced.
Blizzard.targetHelp: The Blizzard is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your Accuracy, attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

Snow_Storm.help: The freezing Snow Storm is reducing your movement speed and attack speed.
Snow_Storm.targetHelp: The freezing Snow Storm is reducing your movement speed and attack speed.

SummonFX.help: This power is simply the visual fx for when the Hero is released.
SummonFX.targetHelp: This power is simply the visual fx for when the Hero is released.
